_sText:
My second map.

Ok now I was playing S.T.A.L.K.E.R Shadow Of Chernobyl one day on an arena match and had the idea for this map so here it is.

It still needs alot of work though and im going to add crowd cheer sounds and an actual crowd soon. But until then this is it.

Your probably also thinking why does he publish a half finished map? Well thats because for some reason I dont know about.
